game.name: Be a Pirate
game.shortDescription: Be a Pirate - a game about a small but brave pirate, whose goal is to collect all the coins and escape faster, because time is limited.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Be a Pirate - a game about a small but brave pirate, whose goal is to collect all the coins and escape faster, because time is limited.

reviewHighlights.text: The graphics made me nostalgic for Windows 95 screensavers. The gameplay made me want to walk the plank.
